item.title: Cadence & proportion: developing skills as an adult
item.description: The first months after start exercising you improve regardless of how efficiently you train, just because doing anything is better than doing nothing. These are called newbie gains. This pattern exists everywhere: we are bound to make rapid progress at almost anything that we start learning deliberately, at least in the beginning. But what happens after the newbie gains are over? You need a method. And if you are an adult leading a busy life and wanting to dig deep into a new pursuit, that method better be good.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Santiago Munoz, also known as Shin Kasbe on the internet. I graduated from uni as an Industrial Engineer (Electrical Engineer) and dedicate myself to making software and art. In my spare time I also enjoy skateboarding and tinkering.
